text:
P.T. Rudra Goud, Joint Chief Electoral Officer, Puducherry, held a discussion with the election officials and nodal officers here on Saturday. An official release here said that Mr. Rudra Goud ascertained the preparation for the elections.

Welding unit

worker murdered

A 46-year-old person C. Thangapandian of Tirunagar was murdered by his son T. Siva (26) on Saturday. Police said that Thangapandian, a worker attached to a private welding unit, had borrowed money from his neighbours but was unable to repay the debt. It resulted in a dispute between the neighbours and Thangapandian. His son Siva, irked over the problem, attacked his father with deadly weapons near the burial ground and done him to death. Police recovered the body and sent it for post-mortem. The Town police arrested Siva and registered a case of murder. Further investigation is on.

Man arrested for

brother’s murder

A 45-year-old person P. Kannan was arrested on a charge of having murdered his brother P. Muthu (35) at their residence in Ammanipattu village near Karambakudi on Saturday. Police said that a family dispute caused the incident.
title: Official reviews poll preparation
